text: Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia dagheba ataghɨrazir dughiamɨn ia gumazir ifavaribar mɨn uan guabagh ekuan markɨ. Gumazir ifavariba dagheba ataghɨrazir dughiamɨn, gumaziba men ganasa, me uan guaba ruer puvatɨgha pughpurighav arui. Me odava arazir kabagh ami. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, me uan ivezim inigha gɨfa.
